param.name: params
param.comment: pass a single Table filled with the wanted param Values here to make calls via list possible (always has priority)

param.name: destination
param.comment: Destination Space to where the Ship will be escorted to (will check on Zone Context changes)

param.name: destination_timeout
param.comment: NYI // Planned: How long the ship will continue the Escort after arriving in Destination context (will check on Zone Context changes)

param.name: timeout
param.comment: NYI // Planned: Game Time until when the Ship will be Escorted (will check on Zone Context changes)

param.name: return_waypoint
param.comment: optional: Waypoint to move to first after Escort ended (to account for Range Waypoints)

param.name: value
param.comment: optional: For Trade/Mining Escort Jobs the eventual Value of the Goods Transported - to determine the amount of neccesary Escorts
